tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    achievement_id INT NOT NULL,
    achievement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    milestone_completed DATETIME NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, achievement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_milestones (
    milestone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    milestone_name VARCHAR(255),
    milestone_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_achievements(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    achievement_name VARCHAR(50),
    achievement_description TEXT,
    achievement_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE milestones (
    milestone_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    milestone_name VARCHAR(50),
    milestone_description TEXT,
    milestone_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    total_achievements INT,
    total_milestones INT,
    current_level INT,
    experience_points INT
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    achievement_name VARCHAR(50),
    achievement_description TEXT,
    achievement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE milestones (
    milestone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    milestone_name VARCHAR(50),
    milestone_description TEXT,
    milestone_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    reward_name VARCHAR(50),
    reward_description TEXT,
    reward_value INT,
    reward_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    player_level INT,
    player_experience INT,
    player_join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    achievements_completed INT,
    milestones_completed INT,
    rewards_earned INT,
    progress_date DATE
);
